summary: Okay so this may near unpopular opinion but I really don't appreciate Lukas's friends this season. I mean they are such jerks....
question: Okay so this may near unpopular opinion but I really don't appreciate Lukas's friends this season. I mean they are such jerks. Like Yann is the ONLY ONE who actually cared to ask Lucas if it here was something wrong?? Arthur and Basile didn't even bother??!! And like when Lucas was angry at the last episode and snapped out on them Arthur blamed him!? Like he had been getting on their nerves all this time?! That was such bullshit it was really angry
answer:
Yeah, I am really not a fan of the French boy squad either. I was actually super indecisive when it comes to Yann before the latest clip and I am still… kinda meh about him? Like, we all know this supposedly this Friday Lucas will come out to Yann so I get that they tried to make Yann a bit more caring? A bit more like he sees and watches his friend and that Lucas is clearly not okay? But tbh before that clip, I really didn’t see that? He was not much different than Arthur and Basile actually?

I can’t really explain it but I really don’t know why they are even friends altogether, to begin with. Like, clearly there is this concept from the OG but from what I have seen this circle of friends is really the first that leaves me complete ???? I mean I maybe was not completely sold on the boy squad from the OG Skam but Jonas was really great and that talk with Isak was fantastic and all. I really appreciated and I cared.

But here?

Honestly? I think the Italian boy squad and especially one Giovanni Garau have completely ruined me because… you really can’t top that tbh.

blog.name: arthusa
blog.title: i need you; i love you

summary: lundi, 6.38am  lucas slowly opens his eyes and takes in the darkness of the living room. he picks up his phone. ‘6.39am’ it...
body:
lundi, 6.38am 

lucas slowly opens his eyes and takes in the darkness of the living room. he picks up his phone. ‘6.39am’ it reads. he slept for two hours. all weekend he hasn’t been able to sleep a wink. he didn’t want to face his roommates either, he just wanted to be alone. but now that it’s monday he doesn’t have much of a choice, he needs to go to school, which means he also has to face everyone.

he’s so scared. after what happened on friday, he could no longer keep all of what he felt inside of him. he cried so much that at a certain point he could’t cry anymore, so much that he even passed out from how tired he was. 

lucas didn’t know what to expect going to school today, what he would have to face. would he talk to his friends (were they even his friends anymore?), did everyone heard what chloè said about him? would he somehow bump against… him? 

he was so invested in his thoughts he didn’t notice manon standing in front of him. “ready?” she asked with a barely there smile on her face. she looked tired which gave lucas a sense of reassurance knowing he wasn’t the only one not sleeping in that house. he couldn’t smile back but he still nodded.

manon lifted her hand to help lucas get up. he grabbed it, an unsaid thank you in the air around them. and maybe, just maybe this day wasn’t going to be as bad as he thought. maybe his life was finally going to start getting better. or at least he liked dreaming about it.

summary: On his reaction to skam france episode 5 of season 5 he told people to go support pewdiepie and he was wearing his merch. I told...
body:
Joe from trophymunchers supports pewdiepie and call his shit an oopsie

On his reaction to skam france episode 5 of season 5 he told people to go support pewdiepie and he was wearing his merch. I told him in the comments how pewdiepie is racist and anti semitic and he basically just ended up mocking me. I didn’t catch on at first as you will see bc i dont catch social cues (my friend pointed out the super duper sounded mocking but yeah) but like this guy yikes

Who let this guy near the skam italia cast

Also please ignore my embarrassing youtube name from when i was 10 thx
